html:
10.11.17  5:44 pm   will you help me on my p.s.a.t?

     i will mail you the answer key, if i can find it

10.11.17  5:12 pm   So what's better than books and movies?

     a life changing adventure

10.11.17  5:10 pm   Would you call yourself a (primarily) Youtube-based musician?

     no

10.11.17  4:10 pm   How should I celebrate my birthday today? 

     get older

10.11.17  4:08 pm   how many tambourines is too many?

     usually more than 1 is not necessary. 2 is ok. 3 would start to be problematic, usually

10.11.17  4:03 pm   what do you even do

     arts, sometimes crafts

10.11.17  4:02 pm   How many socks are too many socks?

     it depends how many you want

10.11.17  3:59 pm   How purple is red?

     usually not quite

10.11.17  3:42 pm   I have a feeling that your content is either a complete stream of consciousness or very carefully analyzed when it's created and reviwed. Are these true?

     those are both tools in my repertoire

10.11.17  3:11 pm   what do you do when you're not making a song or video?

     write tweets, answer questions, and various other things related to bill wurtz and billwurtz dot com

10.11.17  2:28 pm   What have you forgotten?

     well i don't remember then do i

10.11.17  2:25 pm   why is the url for questions billwurtz.com/questions and not billwurtz.com/ueqstions??

     because it's the questions page, with questions on it

10.11.17  1:49 pm   Why are spam emails named after something as delicious and beloved as SPAM?

     i think it was actually named after the spam featured in the monty python sketch, about spam, in which spam seems to be unavoidable and inescapable

10.11.17  12:17 pm   How come you didnt accept the contracts that you were offered?

     perhaps because they didn't have the right terms

10.11.17  12:08 pm   going through a breakup and very dark times, any advice on how to get through this phase?

     re-aquaint yourself with yourself, especially the aspects of yourself that your previous lover did not particularly care for or understand

10.11.17  10:32 am   What's the special meaning behind your soap tips video?

     to start the 2 week schedule, it's probably best to write something reasonably short, to make sure i don't fail in the first week

10.11.17  10:27 am   Why do the Beatles assume all the people are lonely?

     i don't think they do, but one of them may have wrote that as a lyric, maybe 50 years ago

10.11.17  10:07 am   have you already randomly selected your next song?

     i have it down to 12

10.11.17  9:32 am   What's the difference between 'living' and 'existing?'

     living is a much more complicated and interesting way of existing

10.11.17  9:31 am   What's the one thing that people always misunderstand about you?

     that the videos and music actually need to be made, and they do not just instantly appear online

10.11.17  9:25 am   I don't have a question. Can you make up one for me, then answer it?

     not right now

10.11.17  9:01 am   are dutch people better people

     than whom

10.11.17  8:38 am   bill why do i feel things

     because there are things

10.11.17  7:09 am   Why don't you capitalize the first letter of your sentences and put a period at the end of it unless it ends in an appropriate exclamation or question mark?

     that's actually not quite what i do. i quite often skip question marks also, and i usually do use periods, unless it's the last sentence, because at that point it is obviously the end and a period in that case would be unnecessary. but the reason i usually don't feel the need for capital letters at the beginning of sentences is actually because i DO use a period, at the end of the previous sentence. i hope that makes sense

10.11.17  6:14 am   How did it feel getting this "weird" award from that funny hair man?

     he was not the one who gave me the award. he just read the thing on the thing

10.11.17  3:39 am   how much kilometers is 100 miles

     160.934

10.11.17  3:24 am   is college actually going to help me? like at all? should I even stress? 

     it might help you get ahead in society

10.11.17  3:16 am   am I in biology class right now?

     i think it's likely that you were at the time you asked this question, which would mean that right now at the time i am answering it you almost definitely are not

10.11.17  2:53 am   Why isn't there an 'h' in cello? do you think it's because the grammar police is too busy with actual crimes done with dictionaries? chello. cello. CHELLO. CELLO. hmm, it looks better, cleaner, in writing without the 'h', ut that may be because i'm just used to it.

     different languages can use letters in different ways. in fact, some languages use letters that look nothing like any of the letters we are using here

     either way, would you consider learning to play the cello?

     probably not

     i'd uplike your stuff even more if it had actual cello in it.

     i don't think that's true, that sounds like an empty promise

     ok bye thanks.

10.11.17  2:52 am   10.10.17  6:29 pm did you submit this question

     no

10.11.17  2:48 am   do you believe in circles or triangles?

     sure

10.11.17  2:42 am   did you know that numbers are only in our heads?

     i don't think that's true

10.11.17  2:41 am   Do you already know what song you're gonna do next

     i have it down to 12

10.11.17  1:19 am   Do you agree that vinyl adds more depth of sound than digital music? 

     i have not heard enough vinyl to make a reasonable assessment

10.11.17  1:17 am   Have you noticed how republicans tend to use their last name but democrats use their first name? Why do you think this is?

     that's not necessarily true but in this past election i think what you might be noticing was a gender issue

10.11.17  1:16 am   What's your favorite Bonnie Raitt song? 

     come to me

10.11.17  1:14 am   What do you dream about?

     the world i live in, RE-MIXED!!

10.11.17  1:05 am   hi bill how the H*CK am i supposed to find a drum set that's cheap but still kinda good???

     honestly i would suggest just get a kick snare and hi hat. you can get 95% of the work done with that. oh also get a throne or a chair to sit on, and please make sure it's the right height. thighs horizontal

10.11.17  1:03 am   do you sometimes like to pretend to be normal?

     sure

10.11.17  12:57 am   do you have any tips for kicking insomnia's ass

     no but as long as you are awake you could kick some various other types of ass

10.11.17  12:24 am   Is talent just hard work or something one is born with? 

     it's a little bit of neither and both

10.11.17  12:15 am   is karma a reasonable concept?

     sure

     or do you believe everything is predetermined and our actions don't affect what happens down the road?

     no, by the way these questions seem completely unrelated to each other but perhaps i am misunderstanding

10.11.17  12:11 am   i dont get art. what's art?

     anything

10.11.17  12:09 am   Did you mention Canada in your new video so people would stop asking why you never mention Canada?​

     how often are people supposed to mention canada, normally

10.11.17  12:02 am   I feel like now that your videos aren't constrained to 6 seconds, you have time to add pauses sometimes. Thoughts?​

     i think it's nice

10.10.17  11:42 pm   why do you use this as the only medium to communicate with your following

     it's kind of like when you drive a car, you only drive one car at one time. and it's even better if that car was custom built to your exact preferences and specifications. i hope that makes sense

10.10.17  11:39 pm   to get your visuals, do you just listen to the song and imagine what the notes would look like?

     yes but perhaps even more important is the words, and also the entire sound over all

10.10.17  11:34 pm   what color is the sun?

     bright

10.10.17  11:13 pm   How do I know what to do

     you'll just have to guess

10.10.17  11:01 pm   Do you have any friends?

     i will check
